overview: A quartet of slimy degenerates -- ruthless leader Stevie, antagonistic Joey, dim-witted Benji, and their depraved distaff companion Agnes -- seek refuge in a remote snowbound cabin. After discovering a trio of innocent young women residing in said cabin, the perverted gang decide to abuse and terrorize the hapless and helpless ladies.
tagline: Explicit Action to Make You Blush!
title: Winter Heat
